LLRF expert GUI¶

This expert GUI has been created using TaurusGUI as a main framework. A set of specific widgets has been developed and included in the main GUI.

Everything has been package inside the llrfgui module.

llrfgui¶

Module to run the Low Level Radio Frequency expert taurus GUI.

llrfgui.run(period=500)¶

Run LLRF expert GUI.
